result.title: Marketing Campaign
result.description: The marketing campaign intends to contribute to raise awareness about the importance of creating SPCs of HCPV panels. The goal is to convince not only the possible developers and EPC companies, but also the energy community, that REPHLECT solution will bring them direct benefits, not only economically, but also by creating employment whereby the SPC are located and reducing the CO2 emissions.

result.title: Strategic plan to international knowledge-sharing
result.description: Overall strategic plan for the implementation of the action plans in WP2.2-WP2.5. This will require archive data reprocessing and the analysis of academy-industry innovation value chain, in order to produce a strategic gap analysis (of the EU) at Member State level covering all the relevant factors and indicators identified in the target countries analysed in WP1.
